segments.text: I can't believe my eyes, the sink is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, but the woman's completely zoned out drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over the edge, forming a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, it's about to go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand's inside, grabbing treats like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's there too, arm up, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so coordinated in their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, total opposite vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the water sheet falling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big accident any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make it look even more precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wow, what a scene of unaware domestic drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
